entry.title: WIND WARNING , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Temperature: 12.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: SSW 47 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 15.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. High 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
